thread.title: MVHS, MMS set fall athletic awards nights
thread.title_full: MVHS, MMS set fall athletic awards nights

author: news@courierpublicationsllc.com (Staff)
title: MVHS, MMS set fall athletic awards nights
text:
MVHS, MMS set fall athletic awards nights Riverhawks to meet Oct. 29, Panthers Nov. 2 By Staff | Oct 23, 2015 
Waldoboro â€” Fall student-athletes at Medomak Middle School and Medomak Valley High School will be recognized for their individual and team accomplishments at separate sports awards nights. 
MMS fall sports awards will be on Thursday, Oct. 29 at 6:30 p.m. in the school gymnasium. Cake will be served after the event. 
MVHS will hold its event on Monday, Nov. 2 at 6:30 p.m. in the Ronald E. Dolloff Auditorium. Athletes, coaches and parents will meet in the auditorium for boosters and Kennebec Valley Athletic Conference awards, before breaking into team presentations. MVHS All-Sports Boosters will provide light refreshments. 
Athletes at both schools are reminded to dress appropriately. Courier Publications' sports staff can be reached by email at sports@villagesoup.com or by phone at 594-4401.
